articles.title: Is Nintendo Switch 2 On Sale For Black Friday? - IGN
articles.description: While the Nintendo Switch 2 doesn't look likely to see a big price cut this week, there are savings to be had for Black Friday.

articles.title: I'm tracking the best Black Friday TV deals LIVE — here are the can't-miss deals on 65-, 75- and 85-inch TVs you can still get - Tom's Guide
iPhone Black Friday deals LIVE — here are the best offers I've found on iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro and more - Tom's Guide
articles.description: Here’s the best iPhone offers I’ve found so far

articles.title: The best Black Friday deals you can still get on AirTags, iPad, and other Apple gear - The Verge
articles.description: Black Friday 2025 is bringing steep discounts on both current and last-gen Apple gadgets. From AirPods to iPads, here are the best Apple deals still available.

articles.title: The M4 MacBook Air is one of the best Apple deals you can get for Black Friday - The Verge
articles.description: The 13-inch M4 MacBook Air is on sale at multiple retailers for $749 for Black Friday, which remains its lowest price to date. The 15-inch model is on sale, too.

articles.title: You can pick up 32GB of DDR5 RAM with a whole PC for $999 for Black Friday - The Verge
articles.description: RAM memory isn’t cheap right now, so instead of getting parts piecemeal, perhaps buying a prebuilt gaming PC from Walmart or Best Buy for Black Friday is the move.
